text:
@PressSec You and your boss too busy draining the swamp for any COVID RELIEF??

The Washington Post
Alert
 
News Alert
Jul 6, 8:43 PM
 
Coronavirus relief loans benefited members of Congress, lawyer who represented Trump and firms that reported creating no jobs
